sect1.title: Receive a stream with a set-top-box
sect1.para: Some set-top-boxes with Ethernet cards can receive MPEG2-TS streams over UDP and support multicast.
Set-top-boxes known to work with VLC are :

listitem.para: Pace set top boxes. (Pace Micro DSL 4000)
Aminocom set top boxes. (all the models with mpeg2)
tuxia / gct-allwell (mpeg4 and mpeg2) sigma designs8174 chipset
i3micro mood200 (mpeg4 and mpeg2 in transport streams)
